---------------------------------------------------------


Mocard is an e-wallet card design that can help accelerate and grow your business. There are 150 card designs that you can customize to your needs. The design is available in three files, on Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.


The design especially on figma has been equipped with card design components, so it will be very easy for you if you want to change the text or logo on the card design with just one type. Just one click and you can change the entire text and logo on 150 card designs.


The design is also 100% all vector based. The design uses google free fonts, and it's very easy if you want to re-edit and do some customization.

Hope you like it.


The design is available in my:

UI8 | Gumroad


Features:

  • Compatibility: Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD
  • 150 Card Designs
  • 100% Everything is Vector Based
  • Easily Editable
  • Well Organized Layer System
  • Fully Customizable
  • Used Google Free Fonts
  • Components, Colors & Styleguide Included


Files included:

  • Figma
  • Sketch
  • Adobe XD


Be sure to check out the preview and let us know your thoughts in the comments section below.
